Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in ezsystems/ezplatform-admin-ui.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.5.0 up to 1.5.25
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.5.0, all versions after 1.5.25
